column4: can someone tell me why when i start my gnome-terminal it shows on my screen for an instant and then closes?
can someone tell me why when i start my gnome-terminal it shows on my screen for an instant and then closes?
can someone tell me why when i start my gnome-terminal it shows on my screen for an instant and then closes?
can you load any other terminal?
start an xterm, type "gnome-terminal" and see if it gives you any error messages
not much I can tell you unless you can supply and error message or something
it started after i turned transparency on
you said your problem started after you turned on transparency, right?
i turned it off and it still closes
do you have any other profiles you could use that don't have transparency enabled?
i got it tow ork, thank you
glad to hear it, what did you change?
i had gradzac: i just had 'run a custom command instead of shell' turned on
cool, glad you got it working
